pr_title: #1406: Move procedures to a designated package

timeline.author: victornoel

timeline.bodyText: @andreoss let's keep the callable implementation within the scalar package since they are functionally equivalent

timeline.bodyText: @andreoss no need for this todo. This class can be used as a Proc so it can be useful for some users.

+ *  unnecessary de-implement Proc. And implement Async for Proc if needed.

timeline.message: (#1406) Remove todo, as it is no longer valid
